name: Modern Army Shooting
description:
A very fascinating 3D FPS shooting game, Real battle scenes, super firepower, enjoy the thrill of shooting down enemy. Eliminate the mafia from the streets of city. Become the best shooter of the town. Play with the latest weapons.

Features:
Challenging commando sniper mission in specified time limit.
Test your real sniper school skills
Realistic desert urban city environment.
Amazing hd graphics and sound effects.
